hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir: "On the day of the Conquest, the Prophet (ﷺ) entered Makkah, and he was wearing a black 'Imamah." [He said:] THere are narrations on this topic from 'Ali, 'Amr bin Huraith, Ibn 'Abbas, Rukanah. [Abu 'Eisa said:] The Hadith is Jabir is Hasan Sahih Hadith

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْعِمَامَةِ السَّوْدَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Black 'Imamah
